DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the Study is to observe the use and utility of the Winx Sleep Therapy System in a clinical practice, for the treatment of patients with obstructive sleep apnea (OSA).
DOC.brief_title: Post-Market Observational Study of the WINX Sleep Therapy for the Treatment of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)
DOC.criteria: Exclusion Criteria Has a severe respiratory disorder, such as severe lung disease, pneumothorax, etc. Has loose teeth or advanced periodontal disease. Is under the age of 18.
